post.body:
Hi all
I wanted to start preparing a good and easy to use help for zeronet, everything looks strange here and it is not good for ordinary users.
The network will grow if ordinary users can understand and use it.
So I wanted to gather all good helps and tutorials and prepare a easy to use tutorial for ordinary users. Can you help me?

comment.body: @Blkdissident: thank you. I will have a look.
